subject: Automobiles
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Despite tumbling near the bottom of the standings as a driver, Michael Waltrip has become a player in the hard-to-crack world of Nascar team ownership.
snippet: Despite tumbling near the bottom of the standings as a driver, Michael Waltrip has become a player in the hard-to-crack world of Nascar team ownership.
